page.title: 09VILLAGE ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content:
swimming pool heating and maintenance. We have lots of Disco's and the Infants have there own as well. Actors and puppeters visit us and put on shows in the Hall.This is also our gymnasium and dining room. Every class also puts on plays for parents and we enjoy it as well although the teachers sometimes have to shout so we can hear them. We have swimming, netball, rounders, cricket, hockey, athletics and football depending on the weather.The rules are different as you get older so thet you can enjoy the games even if you are'nt very good at first.Some people like cross-country running around the playing field.
Helen Hutchinson and Jacqualine Blows aged11years
